channel.title: CVE Feed for Pratik Chaskar -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Pratik Chaskar -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-37278|2024-08-02T03:50:56.104Z -- pratik%20chaskar -- cards%20for%20beaver%20builder
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Pratik Chaskar Cards for Beaver Builder.This issue affects Cards for Beaver Builder: from n/a through 1.1.4.

item.title: CVE-2024-37919|2024-07-22T13:34:55.369Z -- pratik%20chaskar -- timeline%20module%20for%20beaver%20builder
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Pratik Chaskar Timeline Module for Beaver Builder allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Timeline Module for Beaver Builder: from n/a through 1.1.3.
